bug.author: alanakbik
bug.description:
Describe the bug When instantiating UD_GERMAN_HDT() corpus, the download of the train files fails because they have been renamed (and multiplied!). Error is: OSError: HEAD request failed for url https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UniversalDependencies/UD_German-HDT/dev/de_hdt-ud-train-a.conllu with status code 404. To Reproduce from flair.datasets import UD_GERMAN_HDT
corpus = UD_GERMAN_HDT()
